products.title: UNIK SERIES (SLIM LED FLOOD LIGHT)
products.description: High-performance outdoor LED flood light with wide power range and robust IP65 protection for versatile exterior applications.
features: Integrated reflector and heat sink, free of screw fixing.
High transparent tempered lens with 140 lumen/watt efficiency.
Ergonomic light distribution with proper and even lighting performance.
High IP65 protecting class, resistant to corrosion, thermals and shocks.
Advanced cooling structure technology is applied in the LED flood lighting.
